entry.title: Wednesday night: Periods of rain mixed with snow. Temperature steady near plus 3.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Periods of rain beginning this evening. Rain mixed with snow this evening. Wind becoming south 30 km/h gusting to 50 early this evening. Temperature steady near plus 3. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Wednesday 15 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Periods of rain. High plus 5 with temperature falling to minus 6 in the afternoon.
entry.summary: Periods of rain ending early in the afternoon then clearing. Wind southwest 20 km/h increasing to 40 gusting to 70 late in the morning. High plus 5 with temperature falling to minus 6 in the afternoon. Wind chill minus 14 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Wednesday 15 February 2023
